dashbite.description: DashBite is a fullstack platform designed to optimize online orders and operations management for clients, businesses, delivery personnel, and administrators. It integrates complete modules including login and registration, profile management, product catalogs, orders, addresses, favorites, and administrative panels with detailed reports. agrogestor.title: AgroGestor
agrogestor.description: AgroGestor is a complete digital platform designed to revolutionize modern agricultural management. This web application allows farmers and agro-industrial companies to optimize their production processes through real-time control of crops, resources, and critical data. The platform will integrate IoT technologies for continuous monitoring of environmental conditions, soil moisture levels, temperature, and other vital parameters. With an intuitive dashboard and predictive analysis tools, AgroGestor facilitates informed decision-making, improves resource efficiency, and maximizes crop yields. Additionally, it allows exporting crops to a CSV file according to the filters applied within the application. It offers scalable membership plans and real-time notifications, with a focus on security, accessibility, and an intuitive user experience.

j-tag-events.title: J Tag Events
j-tag-events.description: J Tag Events is an elegant and functional corporate website developed specifically for a leading event organization company. This project represents a complete web solution built with fundamental technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript, demonstrating that it is possible to create impactful digital experiences without relying on complex frameworks. The website features an interactive and visually appealing catalog of all services offered by the company, from corporate events to private celebrations. Each section of the site has been carefully designed to highlight the company's professionalism and creativity, including a dynamic gallery that displays completed events with smooth transition effects and a category filtering system. The platform also incorporates a fully functional contact form with real-time validation, automatic quoting system, and social media integration. The responsive design ensures an optimal experience on all devices, while the carefully implemented animations and visual effects create fluid and engaging navigation.
